name: Dwarfsmith
description:
Made for the 2020 Global Game Jam! The theme was REPAIR.

You are a dwarfen forgemaster! You must fix as many pickaxes as you can before time runs out so that the miners can collect gold for the kingdom!

Credits:

Conner Curtis: Team Leader, Programmer, Character Artist

Sam Kreimer: Programmer; Sam's itch: https://tricenatops.itch.io/
